sentence.Network_en: Affix the blue airmail label and leave the rest to us.
sentence.Network_cn: 贴上蓝色的空邮标签，其余的事情交给我们。

sentence.Network_en: Complete the form and affix four tokens to its back.
sentence.Network_cn: 填完该表，在背面贴上4张凭券。

sentence.Network_en: Affix the stamp to the upper right corner of the envelope.
sentence.Network_cn: 把邮票贴在信封上的右上角.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French affixer or medieval Latin affixare, frequentative of Latin affigere, from ad- 'to' + figere 'to fix'

entry.def: If you affix one thing to another, you stick it or attach it to the other thing.

example.ex: Complete the form and affix four tokens to its back...
example.tran: 填完该表，在背面贴上4张凭券。

example.ex: I covered the scroll in sealing wax, and affixed a red ribbon.
example.tran: 我用封蜡将卷轴封好，并系上一根红丝带。

entry.def: An affix is a letter or group of letters, for example 'un-' or '-y', which is added to either the beginning or the end of a word to form a different word with a different meaning. For example, 'un-' is added to 'kind' to form 'unkind'.

means.word_mean: 1. a linguistic element added to a word to produce an inflected or derived form

sentences.sentence: "He appended a glossary to his novel where he used an invented language"

means.word_mean: 3. attach or become attached to a stem word;

auth_sentence.content: Since the mechanism works in the wet, it could be used to affix implants within the body.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since the mechanism works in the wet, it could be used to affix implants within the body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since the mechanism works in the wet, it could be used to affix implants within the body.

auth_sentence.content: There is nothing para, supra, meta, super or whatever prefix you care to affix to the words normal or physical.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is nothing para, supra, meta, super or whatever prefix you care to affix to the words normal or physical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is nothing para, supra, meta, super or whatever prefix you care to affix to the words normal or physical.

auth_sentence.content: It might be equally interesting to affix a long dummy arm to artificially lengthen your arm to see what happens.
auth_sentence.res_content: It might be equally interesting to affix a long dummy arm to artificially lengthen your arm to see what happens.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It might be equally interesting to affix a long dummy arm to artificially lengthen your arm to see what happens.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 固定设备;预定日期;比赛时间;定期存款
stems_affixes.word_buile: fix固定+ture表名词→n.固定设备;预定日期;比赛时间;定期存款
pre前+fix固定→固定在前面→前缀
suf后+fix固定→在后面固定→后缀

sentences.en: affix a label to a bottle
He affixed the sign to the wall.

means.word_mean: 附加；加(附言)，附上(签名等)，(尤指在末尾)添上

sentences.en: She affixes her real name to her writings.
He affixed his signature to the document.
sentences.cn: 他在那份文件上签了名。

means.word_mean: 盖(印章)；(在邮票上)盖(邮戳)

sentences.en: The affixes “un-”and“-less”are often used make negative words, such as unhappy or careless.
sentences.cn: 词缀un-和-less常用来构成否定词，如unhappy和careless。
